contayner.description: A cozy hotel close to nature: comfortable rooms, a warm atmosphere, and everything you need to relax. Book in minutes and enjoy your trip with no extra worries.
contayner.formDesc: Our specialist will contact you as soon as possible.

contatnear2.title: About the hotel
contatnear2.text1: Our hotel is designed for a calm and comfortable stay at any time of the year. Spacious rooms, cleanliness, quiet surroundings, and attentive service help you feel relaxed and welcome from the very first moments.
contatnear2.text2: We carefully thought through every detail to make your stay as convenient as possible. A good location, a pleasant atmosphere, and friendly staff create a truly comfortable and enjoyable experience.

wifi.title: Free Wi-Fi
wifi.desc: Fast and stable internet throughout the hotel.

access.title: 24/7 Access
access.desc: Check in and out at any time of the day or night.

tv.title: TV
tv.desc: Modern TVs with essential channels in every room.

parking.title: Parking
parking.desc: Convenient and secure parking for hotel guests.

cleaning.title: Wet cleaning
cleaning.desc: Regular room cleaning to keep everything fresh and tidy.

laundry.title: Bath & laundry complex
laundry.desc: A place to relax and take care of your clothes.

kitchen.title: Private kitchen
kitchen.desc: A fully equipped kitchen for self-cooking.

banquet.title: Banquet hall
banquet.desc: A spacious hall for events, celebrations, and meetings.

canteen.title: Spacious canteen
canteen.desc: A comfortable dining area for pleasant meals.

user1.name: Ivan
user1.text: I stayed here for a few days and really enjoyed it. Clean rooms, quiet nights, and a very friendly staff.

user2.name: Ivan
user2.text: A great place to rest after a long trip. Comfortable beds and a calm, relaxing atmosphere.

user3.name: Ivan
user3.text: I was pleasantly surprised by the price-quality balance. Everything worked perfectly, and the room was clean.

user4.name: Ivan
user4.text: A cozy hotel where you feel relaxed and welcome. I would definitely stay here again.
